frame.name: Visitor_scenario
frame.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> leaves their <fen>Normal_location</fen> and matches location with an <fen>Entity</fen> in pursuit of a <fen>Purpose</fen>. The <fen>Agent</fen> temporarily remains with the <fen>Entity</fen> to fulfil this <fen>Purpose</fen> and then departs again, usually back to the <fen>Normal_location</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The sentient entity that heads toward and is temporarily with the <fen>Entity</fen> in order to fulfil some <fen>Purpose</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition: <def-root>A place that is permanently associated with entities or characteristics that the <fen>Agent</fen> wishes to use for some <fen>Purpose</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The activity that is enabled by the <fen>Entity</fen> and that the <fen>Agent</fen> wishes to achieve.</def-root>

FE.name: Normal_location
FE.definition: <def-root>The location that the <fen>Agent</fen> normally resides in or is (permanently) associated with.</def-root>
